Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System and Oral Physiological Phenomena/Dental Physiological Phenomena/Dental Physiological Processes/Tooth Resorption/Root Resorption
Record.BroaderTerm: Digestive System and Oral Physiological Phenomena
Record.Description: Resorption in which cementum or dentin is lost from the root of a tooth owing to cementoclastic or osteoclastic activity in conditions such as trauma of occlusion or neoplasms. (Dorland, 27th ed)
